original_title: China, India agree to uphold ties
article_summary: China and India have agreed to strengthen ties, with a focus on improving strategic perceptions, enhancing mutual trust, and expanding cooperation. The aim is to stabilize the relationship and make progress on the long-standing boundary question, which could bring greater stability to Asia and beyond. Both countries also expressed a desire to deepen understanding, strengthen trust, and broaden cooperation, particularly in the context of the 75th anniversary of bilateral ties and the upcoming Shanghai Cooperation Organization Summit.</s>
